TitleEnglish: I Want to Escape from Princess Lessons
SummaryEnglish: Leticia Dorman, daughter of a duke, is less than thrilled to be engaged to a crown prince. Betrothed since childhood and trained to be queen, she always hoped Prince Clarke would fall for someone else one day. So when he shows up at a ball with another woman, Lettie excitedly retreats to the countryside to start her new life—only for Clarke to appear, determined to win her heart. She wastes no time retreating to an easygoing countryside life, but her newfound peace is cut short when the prince shows up and claims she's still his fiancée! Clarke is determined to win Lettie over and marry her, while Lettie is determined to resist his charms and escape! Who will emerge victorious in this heart-pounding battle of wills?
Aliases: I Want to Escape From Princess Education
The Me Who Wants to Escape the Princess Training
I Want to Escape From Princess Training

1.SummaryEnglish: Leticia loved playing in nature before she was sent to the castle as a candidate to marry Prince Clarke. Years of harsh princess lessons seem to have transformed Leticia into a lady... until a ball one night where she finds her prince with another woman.

2.SummaryEnglish: Leticia moves to her family's countryside estate and spends her time frolicking in nature. While she is fishing one day, her ex-fiancé Clarke suddenly appears. Puzzled by the visit, Leticia shows Clarke around the village and then learns a shocking fact.

3.SummaryEnglish: Clarke forces Leticia to return to the castle. Upon arriving, he promises that she will be able to spend as much time in nature as she wants. Leticia starts to wonder if marriage is not such an awful idea after all, but she still yearns for more freedom.

4.SummaryEnglish: Stuck behind bars in a new room, Leticia talks to Brianna and Nadir about her hopes and dreams before noticing a hidden door during an escape attempt.

5.SummaryEnglish: When Leticia steps out from an evening ball after seeing Clarke with another woman, she is suddenly kidnapped.

6.SummaryEnglish: With the help of her friends, Leticia temporarily leaves the castle to investigate Clarke's new mystery lover.

7.SummaryEnglish: Louis plots to woo Maria with a surprise gift of macarons but instead triggers a tense, late-night ghost hunt.

8.SummaryEnglish: Clarke thinks back on Leticia's early days at the castle and reevaluates his naive attempts to make her happy.

9.SummaryEnglish: Shortly after Leticia resumes her lessons, a strange incident occurs at the newly renovated conservatory bath.

10.SummaryEnglish: Leticia recalls joyful childhood memories after Queen Laura reminds her that Prince Clarke was her first love.

11.SummaryEnglish: With wedding preparations in full swing, rumors spread that Clarke wishes to renounce his claim to the throne.

12.SummaryEnglish: Leticia and Clarke settle in to married life as their friends playfully encourage them to take the next step.
